title: Preferred online retail payment methods worldwide 2017
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Payment Method, and Share of online shoppers in each Payment Method on the y axis.
Payment Method Credit cards has the highest Share of online shoppers and Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) has the lowest Share of online shoppers.
The Share of online shoppers of Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) is 14.0% smaller than the maximum value at Credit cards.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Payment Method in the x axis and Share of online shoppers in the y axis.
The Share of online shoppers is appeared to be the highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Payment Method, and Share of online shoppers in each Payment Method on the y axis.
Payment Method Credit cards has the highest Share of online shoppers and Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) has the lowest Share of online shoppers.
The Share of online shoppers of Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) is 14.0% smaller than the maximum value at Credit cards.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of online shoppers for 9 number of Payment Methods.
The Share of online shoppers is appeared to be the highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
The minimum Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) has got 14.0 times less Share of online shoppers than the maximum Payment Method Credit cards.

The Payment Method Credit cards has the highest Share of online shoppers, followed by Electronic payment (PayPal if available), and Debit cards. Down to the Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) which is the lowest.
Similar Share of online shoppers is found in Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin), and Other.
The average Share of online shoppers in all 9 Payment Methods is 20.78.
Summing up the values of all Payment Methods, we get total 187.0.
